sourcesContent:
import { FC, useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Button, Card, Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap" import { useHistory, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { useItems } from "../../../hooks/useItems" import { itemsApi } from "../../../api/moviesDB" import { Trailer } from "../../../types/models" type ParamsType = { id: string } const DetailCard: FC = () => { const { getDetail, itemDetail } = useItems() const { id } = useParams() const { goBack } = useHistory() const [trailers, setTrailers] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { getDetail(id) }, []) useEffect(() => { console.log(itemDetail?.id) }, []) useEffect(() => { itemsApi .getTrailerTMDB(itemDetail?.id, itemDetail?.media_type!) .then((response) => setTrailers(response)) }, []) return (

Detalle: {itemDetail?.title}

  • Fecha de estreno: {itemDetail?.release_date}
  • Descripción: {itemDetail?.overview}
  • Idioma original: {itemDetail?.original_language}
  • Trailers: {trailers?.map((trailer) => ( ))}
) } export { DetailCard }
